entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
